originalText.text:
Zeit Contemporary Art Gallery @ Art Miami last year was the highlight of my visit. Joan Robledo-Palop was absolutely engaging...and has exceptional knowledge of the arts.
Looking forward to Zeit Contemporary Art  @ Art Miami 2023.        See you there!

text.text:
Zeit Contemporary Art Gallery @ Art Miami last year was the highlight of my visit. Joan Robledo-Palop was absolutely engaging...and has exceptional knowledge of the arts.
Looking forward to Zeit Contemporary Art  @ Art Miami 2023.        See you there!

originalText.text: The owner of Zeit Contemporary Art is the consummate professional--extremely knowledgeable about the history of art and the art market; very friendly and easy to contact; and forthcoming with information about the artwork in question. In short, it was pleasure making a purchase from Zeit Contemporary Art.

text.text: The owner of Zeit Contemporary Art is the consummate professional--extremely knowledgeable about the history of art and the art market; very friendly and easy to contact; and forthcoming with information about the artwork in question. In short, it was pleasure making a purchase from Zeit Contemporary Art.

originalText.text: I just purchased a wonderful print through Zeit Contemporary Art and they were incredibly prompt and professional throughout the entire process--probably one of the best experiences purchasing fine art online or in person!  Absolutely amazing and the work arrived and is more gorgeous than the photographs!

text.text: I just purchased a wonderful print through Zeit Contemporary Art and they were incredibly prompt and professional throughout the entire process--probably one of the best experiences purchasing fine art online or in person!  Absolutely amazing and the work arrived and is more gorgeous than the photographs!

originalText.text:
Purchasing art from Solomon Bass with Zeit Contemporary Art was a wonderful experience.  Solomon is incredibly knowledgeable about art and so thoughtful and kind.  It was fantastic to discuss ideas with him, and learn the influences and history of the piece we purchased.
Solomon followed up to make sure we received our art and was happy to discuss its placement in our home.  He is truly a pleasure to work with, and we would be thrilled to purchase art again with Zeit Contemporary.

originalText.text: As a long time collector of master prints, I was very impressed with the professionalism of Zeit Contemporary. My background as a painter/educator is responsible for my interest in prints. My recent purchase of a Hockney print from the Zeit Contemporary Gallery in NYC was an excellent experience- -I highly recommend this gallery with great enthusiasm and confidence in their well deserved reputation.
